itemLabel: Gerald Spring Rice, 6th Baron Monteagle of Brandon

wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Spring Rice, 6th Baron Monteagle of Brandon (5 July 1926 – 17 November 2013) was an Anglo-Irish British Army officer, banker and Conservative peer.

link_mentions.page: List of political families in the United Kingdom
